content: संगिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} United with, meeting. {@--2@} Attached or devoted to, fond of; <ls>Ś. 5. 11</ls>; <ls>R. 19. 16</ls>; <ls>M. 4. 2</ls>; <ls>Bg. 3. 26</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">14. 15.</ls> {@--3@} Full of affection, desirous. {@--4@} Libidinous, lustful. {@--5@} Continuous, uninterrupted; <ls>Ki. 14. 59.</ls>
